extendedInfo.description: Futsal world is an application exclusively dedicated to futsal which allows you to purchase futsal clothing, register for futsal courses, Design traing work out through coachFX Futsal design your workouts and plan your trainings.It contains a players with which to display the stored strategies for a better interpretation, which also lets you set playback speed. Store up to 50 plays of five types (Corner, Free-kick, Kick-in, rotation Play, Pivot play &Other)You can also use it freely as a blackboard to explain your instructions.Get discount codes for futsal shoes,clothes and balls.Gingasports Code - ukfutsal CoachFX - UKFUTSALMolten  Code FA400310
